altTitles.ja: 恋*音

description.en: During her summer break before entering high school, Mimori Ichigo goes to her grandmother's house near the ocean. There, she helps out at her grandmother's shop. One day while walking her grandmother's dog in the evening, she meets a boy named Kouki. They meet again, but this time she also meets Kouki's cousin named Taiga. For some odd reason Kouki has no memory of when they met and Taiga begs her to not tell him either. Later, she and Kouki sneak out to watch the fireworks, but they separate dramatically. When Ichigo goes to high school, coincidentally, Kouki and Taiga are also there, but they have no memory of her. Are they faking it or are they just lying? If so, why lie?

title.en: Omega ni Dake wa Naritakunai!! ~Isekai Tensei Shitara Ane no BL Manga no Nakadeshita~

altTitles.ja: Ωにだけはなりたくない!! ～異世界転生したら姉のBL漫画の中でした～

altTitles.en: I Don't Want to Be Just an Ω Omega! ~I Was in My Sister's BL Manga When I Reincarnated in Another World~

description.en: Aspiring manga artist Taisei Kuji is an assistant to his sister, a popular BL mangaka. One day, Taisei was unluckily run over by a truck and found himself reincarnated into the omegaverse world drawn by his sister!

altTitles.ja: アネモネは熱を帯びる

description.en: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?
description.id: Nagisa Ootsuki melepaskan dirinya yang dulu karena malu karena gagal dalam ujian masuk sekolah menengahnya. Pada hari pertamanya di sekolah menengah barunya, siapa yang dia temui selain gadis yang membuatnya gagal dalam ujian! Bagaimana Nagisa menghadapi emosi yang rumit ini?
description.pt: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de chumbar nos exames de admissão ao liceu. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a rapariga que a fez chumbar no exame! Como é que Nagisa lida com estas complicadas emoções?
description.pt-br: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de reprovar no exame de admissão ao Ensino Médio. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a menina que a fez falhar na prova! Como Nagisa lidará com estas emoções complicadas?

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: シバタリアン

description.en: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

title.en: Mob Kousei no Ore Demo Boukensha ni Nareba Riajuu ni Naremasuka?

altTitles.ja: モブ高生の俺でも冒険者になればリア充になれますか？

altTitles.en: Can Even a Mob High Schooler Like Me Be a Normie If I Become an Adventurer?

description.en:
It has been decades since labyrinths first appeared in the modern world of Japan, bringing with them monsters and related catastrophes. With this brought many changes; the biggest one being a new profession called 'Adventurer' and the monster cards they use to summon their own monsters to fight and conquer labyrinths with.

Kitagawa Utamaro, nickname Maro, is a mob highschooler who becomes an adventurer due to being incited by a former friend of his having sudden social success among their peers simply by becoming an adventurer himself.
However, things aren't quite as easy for Maro. Just becoming an adventurer in name only isn't enough for him to gain his spotlight, giving him no recourse but to actually tackle labyrinths with the peculiar and not very versatile monster cards that he barely manages to scrape up.

[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0112fi/)  (JP)

altTitles.th: เทพเกรียน โรงเรียนมัธยม

altTitles.ja: ゴッド・オブ・ハイスクール

description.en:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

altTitles.ja: 恋せよまやかし天使ども

altTitles.en: Fall in Love, You False Angels

description.en: Otogi Katsura has had a reputation for being a beautiful girl at school since she entered the school. She is also named president of the class committee, but the vice president, Ichi (Ninomae), is also reputed to be a pretty boy. Unlike her public face, Otogi Katsura is an outspoken character and a martial artist in her own right. She is attracted to the perfect Ichi, who is also perfect on the inside, but she wonders if he also has a dark side.

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki

altTitles.ja: ハーレム王の異世界プレス漫遊記 ～最強無双のおじさんはあらゆる種族を嫁にする～

altTitles.ja-ro: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki ～Saikyou Musou no Ojisan wa Arayuru Shuzoku wo Yome ni suru～

altTitles.en: Harem King's Journey in Another World : The Strongest Warrior Uncle Takes Wives from All Races

description.en: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
description.es:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!
description.es-la:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件

altTitles.en: That Time Only Akari Got Reincarnated as a Slime

description.en: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world… and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.

altTitles.zh: 勇者们都想和魔王修炼

altTitles.en: The Brave Men All Want to Practice Asceticism With the Devil King

altTitles.zh-ro: Yongzhemen Dou Xiang He Mowang Xilian
Yǒngzhěmen Dōu Xiǎng Hé Mówáng Xiūliàn

altTitles.zh-hk: 勇者們都想和魔王修煉

description.en: The cold-blooded Demon King who has beaten all his enemies, who has always been second to none, ended up losing all his magical powers to a female hero who hexed him. What is this magical ritual that you do with the opposite sex’s lips? I can’t believe that even I, the formidable Demon King, have been defeated by this mysterious move! But no worries, I can retrain my abilities. It doesn't matter if you’re a succubus, an elf, a beast woman, or a noble hero’s descendant. I’ll use you as my training partner if I can help it. In order to revive the demon race, I’ll show you the Dual Cultivation Method!

altTitles.ja: 無力聖女と無能王女～魔力ゼロで召喚された聖女の異世界救国記～

altTitles.ja-ro: Muryoku Seijo to Munou Oujo ~Maryoku Zero de Shoukansareta Seijo no Isekai Kyuukokuki~

altTitles.en: The Helpless Saint and the Powerless Princess
The Helpless Saint and the Powerless Princess ~The Story of How a Saint With No Magic Was Summoned to Save Another World~

description.en:
One day, listless part-timer Tamura Nana was summoned out of her room and into another world, after which her summoners declared her a saint and asked her to save their world. However, though she was hailed as a saint, it turned out that Nana possessed no magical power at all! To make matters worse, she was chosen as a partner by a princess who can't use magic... 

The helpless saint who has no magic and the powerless princess who can't use magic. And so begins the adventure of these two leftover heroes!

[Official site](https://www.ichijinsha.co.jp/yurihime/title/%e7%8e%89%e5%b4%8e%e3%81%9f%e3%81%be/%e7%84%a1%e5%8a%9b%e8%81%96%e5%a5%b3%e3%81%a8%e7%84%a1%e8%83%bd%e7%8e%8b%e5%a5%b3%ef%bd%9e%e9%ad%94%e5%8a%9b%e3%82%bc%e3%83%ad%e3%81%a7%e5%8f%ac%e5%96%9a%e3%81%95%e3%82%8c%e3%81%9f%e8%81%96%e5%a5%b3/)

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

title.en: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 阿波連さんははかれない

description.en: From the author of Denkigai no Honya-san and Dansai Joshi comes a short-length comedy about Matsuboshi Raidou-kun and his seatmate Aharen Reina-san, who has problems determining how chummy she has to be when approaching other people. Get up close and personal with the small, quiet but unfathomable girl, Aharen-san!
description.ja: 「小さくて」、「物静か」な阿波連れいなさん。隣の席に座るライドウくんは、そんな阿波連さんに距離を感じていた。ある日、阿波連さんが落とした消しゴムをライドウくんが拾ったことで、今度は予想外の急接近!?　「遠すぎたり」「近すぎたり」予測不能な阿波連さん。
description.uk: Історія про дівчину на ім'я Ахарен. Вона нещодавно переїхала в інше місто і перейшла до нової школи, де намагається знайомитися з однокласниками та однокласницями. Ось тільки дівчина не з тих, хто соромиться і просто сидить осторонь. Вона просто не знає, що таке особисте простір, і справді може просто підійти до будь-якого однолітка і говорити з ним, як зі своїм найкращим другом. А ще головна героїня часто обіймає хлопців та дівчат, і навіть може покласти на колінки свою голову. Вона дивна, але водночас мила, і намагається бути популярною серед однокласників.
description.vi: Câu chuyện kể về Raidou và cô bạn bàn bên Aharen, một người có vấn đề trong việc xác định khoảng cách khi tiếp xúc với người khác.
description.pt-br: Uma nova comédia sobre Raidou e sua colega de classe Aharen-san, que tem problemas em determinar o quão íntima deve ser quando se aproximar de outras pessoas. Junte-se a pequena, calma, mas incompreensível garota, Aharen-san!
description.zh-hk:
在各方面都讓人『無法預測』的青春戀愛喜劇第１集登場!!

阿波連玲奈同學是個「個子嬌小」又「文靜」的人，
讓座位在她隔壁的來堂同學覺得很有距離感。
某天，來堂同學幫阿波連同學撿起掉到地上的橡皮擦，
使得兩人出乎意料地急速靠近!?

「一下子視而不見」，「一下子親密互動」，
阿波連同學的行為讓人無法預測!!

如果喜歡《高木同學》讓人心癢癢的撩人互動，
那麼更不應該錯過這部「行動派」的搞笑放閃。
看來堂胡思亂想的內心
與阿波連無法預測的行為，
如何碰撞出時而吐糖、時而噴飯的無俚頭戀愛喜劇！

description.en: Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

description.en:
South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)
description.pt-br:
A Coreia do Sul está cheia de leis de merda.
E os ‘deliquentes’ que me empurraram para o inferno nunca foram punidos.
Então, está na hora de me vingar e passar por cima dessas leis de merda.

altTitles.ja: 勇者くんは旅立てない

description.en:
The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!!

And now its time to set out!!

...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills...

Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

description.es-la: “¿Por qué los hombres ven a los pechos o la ropa interior como algo erótico?” ¡¡Tetas, espiar faldas y fetiches de olor...!! Todos sabemos que es lascivo, pero puede ser un concepto mucho más profundo de explicar... ¡Respondamos esa duda junto al “Caballero de la perversión”, Murai, Densuke! ¡¡Damos comienzo a la comedia erótica sobre... ¿Los estudios en la perversión?!!

altTitles.en: The Young Witch Wants To Have Sex?!

altTitles.ja: おぼこい魔女はまじわりたい!

altTitles.zh-hk: 想和見習魔女深入交流！

altTitles.vi: Cô Phù Thủy Trẻ Muốn Được Sex!

description.en: Hiiragi visits Chikage Komori, a transfer student that has never come to school. His chastity is at stake when he comes across a beautiful girl that is wearing nothing but a jacket!?
description.ja: 古森チカゲ。転校生なのに一度も登校した姿を見たことがない彼女のご近所に住む柊木は学校のプリントを届けにいくが、出会った瞬間にいきなりカラダの関係を迫られて!?

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

description.en: Psych House--a special home set up for those with supernatural powers. One day, Nemuru, a boy with a Psych that allows him to change size, invites Kotone, a girl with a teleportation Psych, to live at Psych House. The mysterious but normal days of those with psychic powers now begins!
description.pt-br: Psych House--uma casa especial para aqueles com poderes sobrenaturais. Certo dia, Nemuru, um garoto com uma Psico que lhe permite alterar tamanhos, convida Kotone, uma garota com Psico de teleporte, para viver na Psych House. Agora começam os dias misteriosos, mas ainda normais, daqueles com poderes psíquicos!

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

title.en: Asobinin wa Kenja ni Tenshoku Dekiru tte Shittemashita? ~ Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Lv 99

altTitles.es: ¿Sabías que un donjuán puede cambiar su trabajo por el de un sabio? El bufón del nivel 99 expulsado de la party de los héroes, se convertirá en un "gran sabio".

altTitles.en: Did You Know That a Playboy Can Change His Job to a Sage? ~The Level 99 Jester Expelled from the Heroes' Party Will Become a 'Great Sage'~

altTitles.ru: Знаете ли вы, что бездельник может стать мудрецом? — Шут 99-го уровня, исключенный из отряда героев, достиг звания «Великого мудреца»

altTitles.ja: 遊び人は賢者に転職できるって知ってました？　～勇者パーティを追放されたLV99道化師、【大賢者】になる～

altTitles.ko: 광대는 현자로 전직할 수 있다는 걸 알고 계셨나요?

altTitles.zh: 知道遊人可以轉職成賢者嗎？ ～被勇者隊伍放逐的LV99道化師將會成為【大賢者 】～

description.en:
The Jester ―― More commonly known as the ‘Playboy’ Dylan, was fired from the party of the Heroes. The self-centred Heroes didn’t understand Dylan’s importance to the group.  
  
They were just a group of one-man teams. Not interested in cooperation at all. Any failures are blamed on the jester. Dylan, who was disgusted with such companions and was sick of playing as their comedic foil, happily accepted being kicked out.  
  
The Heroes didn’t know. After saving them many times over with his magic tricks, the level 99 jester can change his job title to that of a ‘Great Sage’.  
  
“Life, how about a rewrite?”  
  
He’s done being the clown. From here on out, he’s going to take the leading role.

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.ja: ザロックンロールバンド

description.en: Chaos ensues after Take's guitar, which belonged to his late uncle, gets stolen.

altTitles.ja: 魔王学園の反逆者

description.en:
Yuuto is an ordinary high school boy who, one day, notices a mysterious tarot card by his bed. He shows it to his parents, who give him the good news - as the son of demonkin, he is eligible to become the next Demon Lord. As such, Yuuto is soon brought to a demonic academy in order to improve his devilish skills and earn the title of demon lord. And, you know, get a harem along the way.   
  
From the author of Masou Gakuen HxH and Ecstas Online.
description.pt-br: "A humanidade é nada mais que escrava para uma raça demoníaca - Um estudante comum do ensino médio, Morioka Yuuto, foi escolhido para ser candidato ao próximo rei demônio. Ele é transferido para o colégio Ginsei, aonde é tratado com desdenho pelos outros estudantes. [Juro que vou te fazer ser rei demônio. Por isso... me torne a sua serva!] Yuuto se encontra com uma linda demônio, Himegami Lizel, que muda o seu mundo e sua vida. Ele pode aprender qualquer tipo de magia instantaneamente e absorver poder mágico infinitamente ao ter contato com suas servas. Esse é um poder especial que os demônios não tinham e era concedida a apenas a um humano, Yuuto. O humano que se tornou candidato a rei demônio e desafiou os mais fortes demônios para ser o próximo rei! Emocionante e fascinante. A fantástica história de ascensão em um colégio de magia se inicia!"

altTitles.ja: 双子に縛られて

description.en: Spying on your classmates doesn't end well... or does it? A guy in whose head two things took precedence over everyone else: women's foots and photography, and what next...

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---

description.en: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

Suddenly, the God of Destruction of Darkness and his devilish attendant Kirushia appear. There exists another warrior race called the toura-jin, who've had deep conflicts with the saiya-jin for a long time. A young wolf takes the centre stage, with no combat experience who can guess what will happen? Various worlds are connected now and a new story starts moving again.

In a world where manga can be enjoyed forever…
Manga culture has been able to blossom thanks to the power of manga lovers.
However, right now, manga is suffering because of piracy.
We need your help.

En un mundo donde el manga se puede disfrutar para siempre...
La cultura del manga ha podido florecer gracias al poder de los amantes del manga.
Sin embargo, ahora mismo, el manga está sufriendo a causa de la piratería.
Necesitamos tu ayuda.
description.ja:
いつまでも漫画を楽しめる世の中に 漫画を愛するみなさまの力で
漫画文化は花開きました。
しかし、今、漫画は海賊版に苦しんでいます。
みなさまの力が必要です。
まずは、下の「漫画」を読んでみてください。
漫画の未来を一緒に創りましょう！

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!

description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

description.en:
There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn, this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human, he is pure oni.  
  
Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans, he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now, in the mother world of Japan, he is still out there slaying oni.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

altTitles.ja: ベルセルク

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

----
 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.
